attr.value: Hoard battle-gear items may be played at this site.
Hoard battle-gear items may be played at this site.
Elves — each character faces 1 strike with 8 prowess (detainment; cancelled if the company contains only Elves)
Taarum Elves faction may be played here with +2 to the roll.
Elves — each character faces 1 strike with 8 prowess (detainment if the company contains only Elves)

card.name: Avari
card.text: Playable at any non-haven [H] Elf-hold not in Eriador, Gondor, or Wilderland if the influence check is greater than 11.Standard Modifications: Dwarves (-2), Elves (+2), Men (-2), any non-animal faction in play at any version of this site (-5).Cannot be duplicated at a given site. tap: take one Lingerers from your discard pile to your play deck.

attr.value: Dwarves — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment; cancelled if the company contains a Dwarf)
Hidden site. Unless the company contains an Iron-fist Dwarf, tap a sage or a Dwarf to move to this site.
Hidden site. Unless the company contains an Iron-fist Dwarf, tap a sage or a Dwarf to move to this site.
Men — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
give +2 to the moral and force of Balcoth.

card.name: The Baradhrim League
card.text: Playable on your Ringwraith, if he is in Heralded Lord mode and at a site in Harrhûn, Horse Plains, Gap of Khand,Khand, Kykurian, Kyn, Nûrad or Nuriag. Discard this card to allow his company to move with region movement to any site in these regions. Any character with a home site in these regions may be brought into play with your Ringwraith at Mistrand. If you have in play at least 4 factions playable at sites in the above named regions, this card is worth 2 mp and you may play Favoured by the Eye on your Ringwraith (without any other requirements). Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Bat-winged Helmet
card.text: Unique. Playable on Ûvatha the Ringwraith at any non-Free-hold [F] site in the Sun-lands or the Great Central Plains (does not tap the site). Cannot be transferred. This item affects Ûvatha; he can use Shadow-magic and cannot be taken to hand on a body check of 7 or 8. tap: instead of Ûvatha whenever a card is played on him or his company that requires a scout or ranger to tap.

card.name: Bounty of the Earth-maidens
card.text: Playable on Gyogorasag Sanctuary if you have Ent-wives in play. One of the following items is playable at the site (even if tapped) each turn: Athelas, Ent-draughts, Healing Herbs, Miruvor or Old Vinyards. Additionally, your rolls for Early Harvest are modified by +3. Place each successfully played Early Harvest with this card. This card is worth 1 extra mp for each Early Harvest attached. Radagast receives full mp for this card. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Channels of Chey
card.text: Magic. Shadow-magic. Ritual. Playable on a company with a shadow-magic using character during the site phase. Make a body check for a non-Wizard hero character at the same site. Modify the body check by +1 for every 5 mind of magic users you choose to tap. If the hero is eliminated, you receive his kill mp and this card is removed from the game. Unless he is a Ringwraith, the shadow-magic using character makes a CC modified by -5.

attr.value: (1st) Men — 5 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Demon — 2 strikes with 12 prowess
s e e e e w d
Any gold ring stored at this site is automatically tested (modify the roll by -2). If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled.
Men — 4 strikes with 7 prowess (detainment if the company contains only Men)
Men — 4 strikes with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

card.name: Dog-lord of Waw
card.text: Place on Dwar the Ringwraith if in play as your Ringwraith; he becomes a War-lord and a leader. You may play this card in lieu of a minor item in your starting company and start the game at The Tower of Alk-waw; Dwar gains this site as a home site. Discard this card to take Gé of Ogamur from your discard pile to your hand.Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Dragon-helm of Uon
card.text: Unique. Playable on Khamûl the Ringwraith at any non- Free-hold [F] site in Wilderland or the Great Central Plains (does not tap the site). Cannot be transferred. This item affects Khamûl; he gains the scout skill and cannot be taken to hand on a body check of 7 or 8. The prowess of any strike against Khamûl from a Dragon or Drake attack is modified by -2. Khamûl’s company may play any type of gold ring item at sites where gold ring items are playable.tap: shuffle Black Rain to your play deck instead of discarding it from play.

attr.value: w w w s s w
(1st) Traps (Hot Springs) — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess;(2nd) Elves — 3 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment against a covert company);
A minion company may not attack another company at this site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site.

card.name: Ered Harmal*
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company containing a ranger. If the company moves with region movement, tap a ranger to move as if the following pairs of regions were adjacent: Heb Aaraan and Khand, Heb Aaraan and Lurmsakun, Khand and Nurad, Lurmsakun and Nurad. The company faces an attack at the beginning of its movement/hazard phase: Orcs — 2 strikes with 7 prowess. Alternatively, if the site moved to is in one of the regions listed above, the hazard limit is reduced by 2 (to a minimum of 2). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Fire-blade of Sen Jey
card.text: Unique. Playable on Ren the Ringwraith at any non-Free-hold [F] site in the Great Central Plains (does not tap the site). Cannot be transferred. This item affects Ren; he gains the warrior skill and cannot be taken back to hand on a body check of 7 or 8. tap: prevent The Fiery Blade from being discarded from play.

card.name: Fire-priest of Chey
card.text: Place this card on Ren the Ringwraith if in play as your Ringwraith; he becomes a War-lord and a leader. You may play this card in lieu of a minor item in your starting company and start the game at Chey Goumal; Ren gains this site as a home site. Discard this card to take Fire-blade of Sen Jey from your discard pile to your hand.Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Gabmog the Dimwitted
card.text: Unique. Leader. +2 EI against Orcs. +1 prowess against Dwarves. Discard on a body check of 8. Gabmog must be chosen for any riddling roll in his company.

card.name: Gé of Ogamur
card.text: Unique. Playable on Dwar the Ringwraith at any non-Free-hold [F] site in the Great Central Plains (does not tap the site). Cannot be transferred. This item affects Dwar; he may use spirit-magic and cannot be taken to hand on a body check of 7 or 8. tap: take Our Own Wolves to your hand instead of discarding it from play (if played on Dwar’s company). Additionally, you may always assign strikes to wolf allies in Dwar’s company, regardless of their status or the attack’s ability.

card.name: Gorovod
card.text: Unique. Can use shadow-magic. May play Freeze the Flesh on an eliminated horse ally, Zûrafy or Oliphant (as if a character). tap: make a CC modified by -2 and eliminate a horse ally or Zûrafy in the company to heal a character in the company.

card.name: Hionvor of Womawas Druz
card.text: Place this card on Khamûl the Ringwraith if in play as your Ringwraith; he becomes a War-lord and a leader. You may playthis card in lieu of a minor item in your starting company and start the game at Laeg Góak; Khamûl gains this site as a home site. If in Black Rider mode Khamûl’s company may move with region movement to a site where gold rings are playable. If in Heralded Lord mode Khamûl’s company may move with region movement to a site where a Ringwraith or a minion faction is in play. Discard this card to take Dragon-helm of Uon from your discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: Asdriags faction is playable at this site

card.name: Iorags
card.text: Unique. Playable at Iorag Camp if the influence check is greater than 8Standard Modifications: any non-man, non-Ringwraith character (-3)

card.name: Ironfists
card.text: Unique. Playable at Nurunkhizdín or Azagarbhun, or at (a tapped) Gundabad if Return to Old Dwellings is played at the site if the influence check is greater than 11Standard Modifications: Ironfist Dwarf (+3), Longbeard Dwarf (-3) tap: make a non-unique Ore card playable at the above named sites this turn.

attr.value: Tap a character during the site phase to heal (from wounded to untapped) another character in his company. Tap the site.

card.name: Logath Herdsmen
card.text: Unique. Playable at Logath Camp if the influence check is greater than 8.Standard Modifications: Men (+1). tap: give -2 prowess to any Animal or Wolf creature attack against one of your companies in Wilderland or the Great Central Plains.

card.name: Long They Journeyed
card.text: You may start the game with this card in lieu of playing a minor item. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. Discard this card to take a non-character manifestation of a Wizard from your play deck to your hand. Pallando or Saruman specific. Your avatar may be brought into play at any non-Dark-hold [D] Man-hold where you have a faction in play.

card.name: Midhir
card.text: Unique. Silvan. +2 EI against Silvan Elves.+2 EI against the Taarum Elves faction.

card.name: Mission to the East
card.text: Playable if you are Alatar, Pallando or Saruman and you have 6 P or more. Playable on a Border-hold [B] or Shadow-hold [S] with a Man automatic-attack in any territory east of Wilderland, if you have played a faction at the site. The site becomes a Wizardhaven [H] and loses all automatic-attacks. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site card. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

attr.value: Port on Sea of Rhûn. Pirates may always be keyed to this site; +1 to its prowess and strikes.
Port on Sea of Rhûn. Pirates may always be keyed to this site; +1 to its prowess and strikes.

card.name: Morinehtar
card.text: Manifestation of Alatar.

attr.value: Hidden site. Gorgoroth; Horse Plains. A company must tap a scout and discard a Lost Knowledge card it controls to move to this site. Contains a hoard
Hidden site. Gorgoroth; Horse Plains. A company must tap a scout and discard a Lost Knowledge card it controls to move to this site. Contains a hoard

card.name: Orcs of the Uldona Spine
card.text: Unique. Playable at Gaurblog Lug if the influence check is greater than 10Standard Modifications: +1 for each trophy in the company (+2 if a Dwarf-trophy), any Orc faction in play in Mordor or Wilderland (-2).

card.name: Orthir
card.text: Unique. Silvan. +2 EI against Silvan Elves.

card.name: Ovatha's Bow
card.text: Unique. Playable at Sturlurtsa. Weapon. Warrior only: +2 prowess to a maximum of 8. If borne by a character with a home site in Khand, Horse Plains or regions adjacent to these: tap: remain untapped against a strike from an attack that does not choose defending characters and is not keyed to a site. tap: before strike assignment in CvCC to wound a horse ally in opponent’s company.

attr.value: Men — each character faces 1 strike with 6 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

card.name: Ring of Flame
card.text: Unique. Ring. Playable at Oraishapek’s Mound, ifyou have played a Binding Ring at the site. Replace Binding Ring with Ring of Flame and remove Binding Ring from play. Bearer can use sorcery. +1 to bearer’s mind and +3 to his EI. tap: take one Some Secret Art of Flame to hand instead of discarding it from play. At the end of each untap phase, bearer must make a roll: if the result is higher than his mind he is tapped (or eliminated if he was wounded).

card.name: Ring of Frost
card.text: Unique. Ring. Playable at Elyamû, if you have played a Binding Ring at the site. Replace Binding Ring with Ring of Frost and remove Binding Ring from play. Bearer can use sorcery. +1 to bearer’s mind and +3 to his EI. tap: take one Bitter Cold to hand instead of discarding it from play. At the end of each untap phase, bearer must make a roll: if the result is higher than his mind he is tapped (or eliminated if he was wounded).

card.name: Ring of the Dispossessed
card.text: Unique. Ring. Playable at Temple of Lokuthor, if you have played a Binding Ring at the site. Replace Binding Ring with Ring of the Dispossessed and remove Binding Ring from play. Bearer can use shadow-magic. +1 to bearer’s mind and +3 to his EI. tap: take one Phantom Devised by Wizardry or Sojourn in Shadows to hand instead of discarding it from play. At the end of each untap phase, bearer must make a roll: if the result is higher than his mind he is tapped (or eliminated if he was wounded).

card.name: Sceptre of Spirits
card.text: Unique. Staff. Playable at Mistrand.+2 EI against Man characters and factions playable in Harrhûn or its adjacent regions. If bearer is a Man character with a mind greater than 5 he can use spirit magic: +2 to his CC for magic cards.

card.name: Taarum Elves
card.text: Unique. Playable at Elanthia if the influence check is greater than 10.Standard Modifications: Dúnedain (+1) Dwarves (-1) Elves (+2), Men (-2)This faction is worth 2 mp if no manifestation of Ren the Unclean is in play. tap: shuffle one Ered Harmal from your discard pile to your play deck.

attr.value: You may discard a minor item from the company during the site phase to heal a character in the company (from wounded to untapped).
During the site phase, discard a minor item from a company at the site to heal a character in the company (from to wounded to untapped), or to remove one corruption card from the company.

Tap a scout at this site to force opponent to reveal any creature keyable to Orgothraat or its adjacent regions. Tap a diplomat at this site to force opponent to discard such a creature from opponents hand.

card.name: Uiendarlaif
card.text: Animals. Wolves. 5 strikes. +2 prowess against animal and horse allies. May be played keyed to any region in the Great Central Plains and regions adjacent to these (except Coastal Sea [c] regions). If Worn and Famished is in play, may also be played keyed to Southern Rhovanion and its adjacent regions. Each excess strike assigned gives a -2 modification to prowess.

card.name: Variag Horse-raiders
card.text: Men. 5 strikes. Playable keyed to Nuriag, Nurad, Gap of Khand, Khand and Chelkar, and to regions adjacent to these. This attack is detainment if opponent is Uvatha, has Variags of Khand in play, or if the company contains a character with a home site in the above named regions.

card.name: Variag-king of Khand
card.text: Place this card on Ûvatha the Ringwraith if in play as your Ringwraith; he becomes a War-lord and a leader. You may play this card in lieu of a minor item in your starting company and start the game at Mistrand; Ûvatha gains this site as a home site. Discard this card to take Bat-winged Helmet from your discard pile to your hand.Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Yanos Kosvar
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against characters and factions playable in Forrhûn and Harrhûn. +1 prowess against Men.
